overview:
Ben McDougal a Thunder Lizard in the Midwest’s Silicon Prairie. He is professionally involved in commercial web development, entrepreneurship, and the video game industry.

  • WEB DEVELOPMENT - Utilizing a CS degree and an endless desire to help people succeed in business, Ben McDougal has developed advanced web design, programming, SEO, and social media skills. As Sales Manager at two major web development firms, Ben has helped businesses improve their overall online representation since 2004. He also conducts informative speaking engagements all around Iowa.

  • ENTREPRENEURSHIP - Ben McDougal’s first entrepreneurial experience was developing a full-scale soccer tournament in 2005. He sold The Iowa 3v3 Soccer Challenge to an Iowa-based soccer club two years later. Soon after, he conceptualized and later invested in a small social network, before executing an early exit strategy.

  • VIDEO GAME INDUSTRY - In 2007, McDougal co-founded Jet Set Studio, which was initially established to support development of the video game community at www.GatheringofGamers.com. Jet Set Studio has since established what they call Video Game Event Management. This innovative service provides live video game experiences for clients all around North America.

The Iowa Pro Gaming Challenge is an example of Ben’s leadership on a grand scale, while his team at Jet Set Studio also collaborate with clients to enhance a variety of corporate events, convention booths, and VIP parties.

In September 2012, Ben McDougal conceptualized and designed an all-new search engine for video game tournaments, at www.TournamentSeeker.com.

McDougal and his team at Jet Set Studio are passionately excited about how Tournament Seeker is unlocking the full potential of Jet Set Studio. They are now considering investment partners to unlock the overall vision.
